Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Allows Frank Pallett of Wappingers Falls, New York to take the competitive civil service examination for the position of police officer and be placed on the eligible list for appointment
Summary: Allows Frank Pallett of Wappingers Falls, New York to take the competitive civil service examination for the position of police officer and be placed on the eligible list for appointment as a full-time university police officer for the State University of New York.
ActClause: AN ACT to allow Frank Pallett of Wappingers Falls, New York to take the competitive civil service examination for the position of police officer and be placed on the eligible list for appointment as a full-time university police officer for the State University of New York
